text:
The Ministry of Health, Labour and Welfare is running a free multilingual hotline re: the #COVID19 #vaccine in Japan.
TEL: 0120-761770 (every day inc. weekends/holidays)
Japanese/English/Chinese/Korean/Portuguese/Spanish: 9:00-21:00, Thai: 9:00-18:00, Vietnamese: 10:00-19:00 https://t.co/LbArGILkCt
